cpu: Kwakwalwar kwamfuta, tana aiwatar da umarni
\u0198wa\u0199walwar samun damar bazuwar: Ƙwaƙwalwar ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya inda ake adana shirye-shirye da bayanai masu gudana
rumbun kwamfutarka: Na'urar ajiya babba mai ƙarfi mara ƙarfi ta amfani da farantin maganadisu
m jihar drive: Ma'ajiya mara ƙarfi ta amfani da ƙwaƙwalwar filasha, sauri fiye da HDDs
bas: Hanya don bayanai don tafiya tsakanin sassan
na'urar shigarwa: Yana ba da damar shigar bayanai cikin kwamfuta (kamar madannai, linzamin kwamfuta)
na'urar fitarwa: Yana gabatar da sakamako ga mai amfani (kamar duba, firinta)
motherboard: Babban allon kewayawa wanda ke haɗa dukkan abubuwan da ke tattare da kwamfuta
hanyar sadarwa ta kwamfuta: Tarin na'urori masu haɗin kai waɗanda zasu iya raba albarkatu
ip address: Mai gano lamba na musamman da aka sanya wa kowace na'ura akan hanyar sadarwa
bandwidth: Matsakaicin adadin canja wurin bayanai a kan hanyar hanyar sadarwa
latency: Jinkirin lokacin don bayanai don tafiya daga tushe zuwa makoma
